marklogic.body: Baloney. You've obviously never been mugged or in a REAL street fight. I have, numerous times in my stupid youth. I've been stabbed, had a broken nose, had ny skull cracked, had brain surgery. Do you know how hard CONCRETE is to a human skull? Do you know how much a REALLY broken nose Bleeds. You swell up right away. This is NOT Hollywood. This is real life. Everything this turd has said has been proven to be a lie by the evidence, his father's buddies in the PD tried to cover up.
